text: 12:10 Rom 5:3; 2 Korin 7:4; 13:4Guizbangɨra, dughiar kɨ gavgaviba puvatɨzim, dughiar kamra kɨ gavgavir bar ekiam iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kraisɨn ziam bangɨn kɨ gavgaviba puvatɨ, ezɨ gumazamiziba pazavɨra na gamima, osɨmtɨzir avɨriba na bativima gumazamiziba arazir kurabar na gami, ezɨ gumazamiziba bar na gasɨghasɨghasava ami. Ezɨ kɨ arazir kabagh nɨghnɨgha nan navir averiam bar deravɨra uabɨn asugha iti.
